descriptionEvent.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The artistic project \"4308\" is the result of collaboration between composer Ignas Yuzokas (LT), drummer Gintautas Gas‌k‌avicus (LT), and the dance theater Ethno Contemporary Ballet (UA). The premiere took place on August 24th in Siauliai, Lithuania.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\"4308\" is a music and dance performance that calls upon its audience to feel the emotional tension and depth of feelings that arise in people during times of conflict. This show is an expression of invincibility and the power of the human spirit in the face of the most formidable challenges.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.kanneltalo.fi"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Kanneltalo","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Helsinki, Finland ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=Kanneltalo%2C+Klaneettitie+5%2C+00420+Helsinki%2C+Suomi"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Address: Klaneettitie 5, 00420 Helsinki","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.lippu.fi/event/ethno-contemporary-ballet-4308-kanneltalo-18056586/#tab="},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"TICKETS","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
